rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C187458

self.title: CDISC ADaM Craig Handicap Assessment and Reporting Technique-Short Form Questionnaires Parameter Code Terminology

definition: A parameter code codelist for the Craig Handicap Assessment and Reporting Technique-Short Form Questionnaires (CHART-SF) to support the calculation of subscores and total score for the Interview and Paper Versions in ADaM.
name: Craig Handicap Assessment and Reporting Technique-Short Form Questionnaires Parameter Code
preferredTerm: CDISC ADaM Craig Handicap Assessment and Reporting Technique-Short Form Questionnaires Parameter Code Terminology
synonyms: Craig Handicap Assessment and Reporting Technique-Short Form Questionnaires Parameter Code

terms.definition: Craig Handicap Assessment and Reporting Technique-Short Form - How many hours in a typical 24-hour day do you have someone with you to provide physical assistance for personal care activities such as eating, bathing, dressing, toileting and mobility? (hours paid assistance).
terms.preferredTerm: Craig Handicap Assessment and Reporting Technique-Short Form - Paid Personal Care per Day

terms.definition: Craig Handicap Assessment and Reporting Technique-Short Form - How many hours in a typical 24-hour day do you have someone with you to provide physical assistance for personal care activities such as eating, bathing, dressing, toileting and mobility? hours unpaid (family, others).
terms.preferredTerm: Craig Handicap Assessment and Reporting Technique-Short Form - Unpaid Personal Care per Day

terms.definition: Craig Handicap Assessment and Reporting Technique-Short Form - How much time is someone with you in your home to assist you with activities that require remembering, decision making, or judgment?
terms.preferredTerm: Craig Handicap Assessment and Reporting Technique-Short Form - Home Cognitive Assistance per Day

terms.definition: Craig Handicap Assessment and Reporting Technique-Short Form - How much of the time is someone with you to help you with remembering, decision making, or judgment when you go away from your home?
terms.preferredTerm: Craig Handicap Assessment and Reporting Technique-Short Form - Away Cognitive Assistance per Day

terms.definition: Craig Handicap Assessment and Reporting Technique-Short Form - On a typical day, how many hours are you out of bed?
terms.preferredTerm: Craig Handicap Assessment and Reporting Technique-Short Form - Hours Out of Bed per Day
synonyms: CHSF-Hours Out of Bed per Day

terms.definition: Craig Handicap Assessment and Reporting Technique-Short Form - In a typical week, how many days do you get out of your house and go somewhere?
terms.preferredTerm: Craig Handicap Assessment and Reporting Technique-Short Form - Days Out of the House per Week
synonyms: CHSF-Days Out of the House per Week

terms.definition: Craig Handicap Assessment and Reporting Technique-Short Form - In the last year, how many nights have you spent away from your home?
terms.preferredTerm: Craig Handicap Assessment and Reporting Technique-Short Form - Nights Away From Home Last Year
synonyms: CHSF-Nights Away From Home Last Year

terms.definition: Craig Handicap Assessment and Reporting Technique-Short Form - How many hours per week do you spend working in a job for which you get paid?
terms.preferredTerm: Craig Handicap Assessment and Reporting Technique-Short Form - Hours of Paid Work per Week
synonyms: CHSF-Hours of Paid Work per Week

terms.definition: Craig Handicap Assessment and Reporting Technique-Short Form - How many hours per week do you spend working in a job for which you get paid? (occupation).
terms.preferredTerm: Craig Handicap Assessment and Reporting Technique-Short Form - Occupation of Paid Work

terms.definition: Craig Handicap Assessment and Reporting Technique-Short Form - How many hours per week do you spend in school working toward a degree or in an accredited technical training program?
terms.preferredTerm: Craig Handicap Assessment and Reporting Technique-Short Form - Hours of Schoolwork per Week

terms.definition: Craig Handicap Assessment and Reporting Technique-Short Form - How many hours per week do you spend in active homemaking including parenting, housekeeping, and food preparation?
terms.preferredTerm: Craig Handicap Assessment and Reporting Technique-Short Form - Hours of Homemaking per Week

terms.definition: Craig Handicap Assessment and Reporting Technique-Short Form - How many hours per week do you spend in home maintenance activities such as gardening, house repairs or home improvement?
terms.preferredTerm: Craig Handicap Assessment and Reporting Technique-Short Form - Hours of Home Maintenance per Week
synonyms: CHSF-Hours of Home Maintenance per Week

terms.definition: Craig Handicap Assessment and Reporting Technique-Short Form - How many hours per week do you spend in recreational activities such as sports, exercise, playing cards, or going to movies?
terms.preferredTerm: Craig Handicap Assessment and Reporting Technique-Short Form - Hours of Recreation per Week

terms.definition: Craig Handicap Assessment and Reporting Technique-Short Form - How many people do you live with?
terms.preferredTerm: Craig Handicap Assessment and Reporting Technique-Short Form - Number of People You Live With
synonyms: CHSF-Number of People You Live With

terms.definition: Craig Handicap Assessment and Reporting Technique-Short Form - Is one of them your spouse or significant other?
terms.preferredTerm: Craig Handicap Assessment and Reporting Technique-Short Form - Live With Spouse or Significant Other
synonyms: CHSF-Live With Spouse or Signif Other

terms.definition: Craig Handicap Assessment and Reporting Technique-Short Form - Of the people you live with how many are relatives?
terms.preferredTerm: Craig Handicap Assessment and Reporting Technique-Short Form - Number of Relatives You Live With
synonyms: CHSF-Number of Relatives You Live With

terms.definition: Craig Handicap Assessment and Reporting Technique-Short Form - How many business or organizational associates do you visit, phone, or write to at least once a month?
terms.preferredTerm: Craig Handicap Assessment and Reporting Technique-Short Form - Associates Contacted per Month

terms.definition: Craig Handicap Assessment and Reporting Technique-Short Form - How many friends do you visit, phone, or write to at least once a month?
terms.preferredTerm: Craig Handicap Assessment and Reporting Technique-Short Form - Friends Contacted per Month

terms.definition: Craig Handicap Assessment and Reporting Technique-Short Form - With how many strangers have you initiated a conversation in the last month?
terms.preferredTerm: Craig Handicap Assessment and Reporting Technique-Short Form - Strangers Spoke with Last Month

terms.definition: Craig Handicap Assessment and Reporting Technique-Short Form - Approximately what was the combined annual income, in the last year, of all family members in your household?
terms.preferredTerm: Craig Handicap Assessment and Reporting Technique-Short Form - Combined Household Income Last Year

terms.definition: Craig Handicap Assessment and Reporting Technique-Short Form - Approximately how much did you pay last year for medical care expenses?
terms.preferredTerm: Craig Handicap Assessment and Reporting Technique-Short Form - Medical Care Expenses Last Year

terms.definition: Craig Handicap Assessment and Reporting Technique-Short Form - Cognitive independence subscore used for analysis.
terms.preferredTerm: Craig Handicap Assessment and Reporting Technique-Short Form - Cognitive Independence Subscore for Analysis

terms.definition: Craig Handicap Assessment and Reporting Technique-Short Form - Economic self-sufficiency subscore used for analysis.
terms.preferredTerm: Craig Handicap Assessment and Reporting Technique-Short Form - Economic Self-Sufficiency Subscore for Analysis

terms.definition: Craig Handicap Assessment and Reporting Technique-Short Form - Mobility subscore used for analysis.
terms.preferredTerm: Craig Handicap Assessment and Reporting Technique-Short Form - Mobility Subscore for Analysis

terms.definition: Craig Handicap Assessment and Reporting Technique-Short Form - Occupation subscore used for analysis.
terms.preferredTerm: Craig Handicap Assessment and Reporting Technique-Short Form - Occupation Subscore for Analysis

terms.definition: Craig Handicap Assessment and Reporting Technique-Short Form - Physical independence subscore used for analysis.
terms.preferredTerm: Craig Handicap Assessment and Reporting Technique-Short Form - Physical Independence Subscore for Analysis

terms.definition: Craig Handicap Assessment and Reporting Technique-Short Form - Social integration subscore used for analysis.
terms.preferredTerm: Craig Handicap Assessment and Reporting Technique-Short Form - Social Integration Subscore for Analysis

terms.definition: Craig Handicap Assessment and Reporting Technique-Short Form - Total score used for analysis.
terms.preferredTerm: Craig Handicap Assessment and Reporting Technique-Short Form - Total Score for Analysis
